# Miranzai Valley Expeditions

| combatant2        = Turi tribesmen
| commander1        = Brig. Gen. Neville Bowles Chamberlain
| strength1         = First Expedition:
3,766
Second Expedition:

| casualties2       = Unknown

0 killed, 14 wounded
Second Expedition:
5 killed, 3 wounded
| commander2        = Unknown
| strength2         = Several Thousand
}}
The Miranzai Valley Expeditions were two British-Indian military expeditions to the North-West Frontier Province in Pakistan.
